verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> that came to Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pethuel <WH6602>.

Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> this, ye old men <WH2205>, and give ear <WH238> <WH8685>, all ye inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>. Hath this been in your days <WH3117>, or even <WH518> in the days <WH3117> of your fathers <WH1> ?
Tell <WH5608> <WH8761> ye your children <WH1121> of it, and let your children <WH1121> tell their children <WH1121>, and their children <WH1121> another <WH312> generation <WH1755>.

That which the palmerworm <WH1501> hath left <WH3499> hath the locust <WH697> eaten <WH398> <WH8804>; and that which the locust <WH697> hath left <WH3499> hath the cankerworm <WH3218> eaten <WH398> <WH8804>; and that which the cankerworm <WH3218> hath left <WH3499> hath the caterpiller <WH2625> eaten <WH398> <WH8804>.

Awake <WH6974> <WH8685>, ye drunkards <WH7910>, and weep <WH1058> <WH8798>; and howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, all ye drinkers <WH8354> <WH8802> of wine <WH3196>, because of the new wine <WH6071>; for it is cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from your mouth <WH6310>.

For a nation <WH1471> is come up <WH5927> <WH8804> upon my land <WH776>, strong <WH6099>, and without number <WH4557>, whose teeth <WH8127> are the teeth <WH8127> of a lion <WH738>, and he hath the cheek teeth <WH4973> of a great lion <WH3833>.

He hath laid <WH7760> <WH8804> my vine <WH1612> waste <WH8047>, and barked <WH7111> my fig tree <WH8384>: he hath made it clean <WH2834> <WH8800> bare <WH2834> <WH8804>, and cast it away <WH7993> <WH8689>; the branches <WH8299> thereof are made white <WH3835> <WH8689>.
Lament <WH421> <WH8798> like a virgin <WH1330> girded <WH2296> <WH8803> with sackcloth <WH8242> for the husband <WH1167> of her youth <WH5271>.

The meat offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is cut off <WH3772> <WH8717> from the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>; the Kohanim <WH3548>, the YY'S <WH3068> ministers <WH8334> <WH8764>, mourn <WH56> <WH8804>.

The field <WH7704> is wasted <WH7703> <WH8795>, the land <WH127> mourneth <WH56> <WH8804>; for the corn <WH1715> is wasted <WH7703> <WH8795>: the new wine <WH8492> is dried up <WH3001> <WH8689>, the oil <WH3323> languisheth <WH535> <WH8797>.

Be ye ashamed <WH3001> <WH8685>, O ye husbandmen <WH406>; howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, O ye vinedressers <WH3755>, for the wheat <WH2406> and for the barley <WH8184>; because the harvest <WH7105> of the field <WH7704> is perished <WH6> <WH8804>.

The vine <WH1612> is dried up <WH3001> <WH8689>, and the fig tree <WH8384> languisheth <WH535> <WH8797>; the pomegranate <WH7416> tree, the palm tree <WH8558> also, and the apple tree <WH8598>, even all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>, are withered <WH3001> <WH8804>: because joy <WH8342> is withered away <WH3001> <WH8689> from the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.

Gird <WH2296> <WH8798> yourselves, and lament <WH5594> <WH8798>, ye Kohanim <WH3548>: howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, ye ministers <WH8334> <WH8764> of the altar <WH4196>: come <WH935> <WH8798>, lie all night <WH3885> <WH8798> in sackcloth <WH8242>, ye ministers <WH8334> <WH8764> of my 'Elohim <WH430>: for the meat offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is withholden <WH4513> <WH8738> from the house <WH1004> of your 'Elohim <WH430>.

Sanctify <WH6942> <WH8761> ye a fast <WH6685>, call <WH7121> <WH8798> a solemn assembly <WH6116>, gather <WH622> <WH8798> the elders <WH2205> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and cry <WH2199> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>,
Alas <WH162> for the day <WH3117> ! for the day <WH3117> of the YY <WH3068> is at hand <WH7138>, and as a destruction <WH7701> from 'El SHaddai <WH7706> shall it come <WH935> <WH8799>.
Is not the meat <WH400> cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> before our eyes <WH5869>, yea, joy <WH8057> and gladness <WH1524> from the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430> ?

The seed <WH6507> is rotten <WH5685> <WH8804> under their clods <WH4053>, the garners <WH214> are laid desolate <WH8074> <WH8738>, the barns <WH4460> are broken down <WH2040> <WH8738>; for the corn <WH1715> is withered <WH3001> <WH8689>.

How do the beasts <WH929> groan <WH584> <WH8737> ! the herds <WH5739> of cattle <WH1241> are perplexed <WH943> <WH8738>, because they have no pasture <WH4829>; yea, the flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> are made desolate <WH816> <WH8738>.

O YY <WH3068>, to thee will I cry <WH7121> <WH8799>: for the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> <WH8804> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness <WH4057>, and the flame <WH3852> hath burned <WH3857> <WH8765> all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>.

The beasts <WH929> of the field <WH7704> cry <WH6165> <WH8799> also unto thee: for the rivers <WH650> of waters <WH4325> are dried up <WH3001> <WH8804>, and the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> <WH8804> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
